citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a complete Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). A compliant IACUC is made
up of at least 3 roles: the Chairman, a Doctor of Veterinary Medicine, and a member who is not affiliated with the facility in
any way other than as a Committee member. The role of this individual is intended to be representation for the interests of
the general community in the proper care and treatment of animals. The facility has two individuals that are meant to fill
this role, but neither have attended any IACUC meetings in 2023 or 2024. The IACUC meets every 6 months. Correct by
appointing a person not affiliated with the facility to act as the representative of the non-scientific community, and who is
able to regularly attend and participate in IACUC meetings. Correct by: October 31, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(b)(3)(ii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The facility does not have a complete Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). A compliant IACUC is made 
up of at least 3 roles: the Chairman, a Doctor of Veterinary Medicine, and a member who is not affiliated with the facility in 
any way other than as a Committee member. The role of this individual is intended to be representation for the interests of 
the general community in the proper care and treatment of animals. The facility has two individuals that are meant to fill 
this role, but neither have attended any IACUC meetings in 2023 or 2024. The IACUC meets every 6 months. Correct by 
appointing a person not affiliated with the facility to act as the representative of the non-scientific community, and who is 
able to regularly attend and participate in IACUC meetings. Correct by: October 31, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
